name: DScaper
description:
For most points on a 1D line it is pretty fatal, if they are running out of space. Only a true DScaper (Dimension Escaper) can avoid the evil and escape into the only available space - another dimension. Be our hero in this prototype and show us your DScaper skills. Escape from 1D to 1.5D (whatever that means oO) to 2D. In future versions, you might be able to escape even into 2.5D and 3D.

Controls
Try the obvious candidates (WASD, Arrow Keys, Space) for moving left, right and jumping.
Use Ctrl+R to Restart the game.
Use Ctrl+1 to jump to the first level.
Use Ctrl+2 to jump to the second level.
Use Alt+F4 to close the game.
